Title: Tim Rogers on the future of Copilot and AI agents | Octoverse 2025
Description:
Join Tim Rogers, Principal Product Manager for GitHub Copilot, as he reacts to the findings in the 2025 Octoverse report. Tim dives deep into the rapid adoption of AI agents, how they are reshaping developer workflows beyond just writing code, security concerns with AI and the future of agents.

#GitHubCopilot #AI #Octoverse

Read the full report: https://gh.io/octoverse

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 Copilot adoption 00:29 Using agents for triage/maintenance 00:52 Startups vs enterprises adoption rate 01:18 Getting started with AI agents 02:00 Agents uses beyond coding 02:41 Devs using less time on coding 03:16 Security concerns with AI 03:40 What's the future with agents? 04:36 Multitasking future
